name: Flight to Eternity
description: Flight to Eternity, checking a plane flying forever and discovering new places.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 / 32-bit Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 / 64-bit Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 30 MB available space
